web_snippets: Bonnie Comfort has been a practicing psychologist for thirty years. She has an MSW from the University of Manitoba and a PhD in psychology.
Bonnie Comfort, Ph.D., is a psychologist and the best-selling author of the books Staying Married Is the Hardest Part, and Denial.
